issues.title: Update System Issue
issues.description: Update System is a little buggy on the app.

issues.title: Reload Glitch
issues.description: Using Ctrl + Shift + R may break the Update System, only use Ctrl + R until I get this fixed. Temporary fix: Open DevTools (Ctrl + Shift + i) and go to Applications, under Service Worker, click unregister on any request, then reload the app.
